title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
Introducing the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, the perfect solution for all your kitchen waste needs. With a quantity of 50 bags per pack, you'll never run out of reliable trash bags again. 

These 13-gallon capacity bags are designed to handle even the heaviest loads. Made from tear-resistant white plastic, they ensure no leaks or spills, giving you peace of mind. The Flex-tra strength provides extra durability, making them perfect for everyday use.

Say goodbye to unpleasant odors with our unscented trash bags. They keep your kitchen smelling fresh and clean without any overpowering fragrances. 

The red drawstring closure not only adds a pop of color but also makes it easy to tie and carry the bag without any mess or hassle. No more struggling to secure your trash bags!

And that's not all - these trash bags are compatible with Alexa Voice Shopping, making it even more convenient to restock. Simply ask Alexa to add them to your shopping list, and they will be delivered right to your doorstep.

Don't settle for subpar trash bags. Upgrade to the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags and experience the ultimate combination of strength, convenience, and reliability.

With a generous capacity of 13 gallons, these tear-resistant white plastic bags are designed to handle all of your kitchen waste. The Flex-tra strength ensures that the bags won't easily tear or break, providing you with a reliable and durable solution. The convenient red drawstring closure makes it easy to tie up and dispose of the trash without any mess or hassle. Plus, with Alexa Voice Shopping, you can conveniently reorder these bags with just a simple voice command.
